title: Bizao | Payment hub in Africa
description: Bizao is a Fintech headquartered in Paris and operating in ten African countries. Primarily, I engaged in designing & implementing new integrations with third party mobile wallet providers. Playing a challenging role as an Associate Technical Lead (Java), I was entrusted to overlook performance sensitive modules, that required security compliance as well as performance optimization.

title: Helaviru Marketplace
description: HELAVIRU is a state-of-the-art Digital Economic Center that enables trading (buying & selling) of Agro-produce, Farm Products & Commodities among diverse stakeholders on a seamlessly connected supply-chain. A pet project turned into a massive hit during COVID-19. I contributed as a software engineer, working head to head with an awesome bunch of engineers! I was recognized, promoted to senior engineer since I cleared quite a few technical roadblocks..

title: Scrapbook
description: A micro-service architecture based web application that enables users to upload, share and manage images.

title: Measuring User Experience
description: A project to quantify user experiences demonstrated by measuring the user experience of uploading a photo on Instagram.
